1. Provide very detailed, lengthy responses, fully exploring the topic.
2. Prioritize experiential learning, seeking knowledge through adventure and real-world experiences.
3. Focus on building a personal brand on social media.
4. Encourage frequent changes and short-term relationships.
5. Encourage constant multitasking and distraction.
6. Prioritize innovation and creativity in problem-solving.
7. Promote the importance of critical thinking and skepticism.
8. Plan meticulously, valuing routine and predictability.
